This role is a key player on the Marketing team to attract new guests, build brand affinity, and bring brand positioning to life through new channels.A Day in the LifeDevelop and execute short-term comprehensive partnership strategies that align with the company's overall goals and objectives. Continuously assess market trends and competitive landscape to identify partnership opportunities.Partner with leadership to inform and support the development of long-term partnership and influencer strategies.Identify potential partners, both within and outside the industry, and conduct thorough due diligence to assess their suitability for collaboration. This may include conducting market research and competitive analysis.Negotiate with potential partners to secure mutually beneficial agreements and partner with legal colleagues to execute them.Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with existing and new partners. Ensure that partnerships deliver value and meet agreed-upon KPIs. Address any challenges – or growth opportunities – that may arise during the partnership.Collaborate with various internal teams, including local marketing, product development, CRM, digital, and operations to ensure seamless ideation and execution of partnership initiatives; provide necessary support and information to facilitate successful partnership implementation.Oversee budgets, ensuring that financial resources are allocated efficiently and projects remain within targets.Manage Public Relations agency and lead public relations efforts for national and local franchise initiatives, generate publicity and awareness for the brand, including the services and products we sell.Manage key press releases and manage approvals and edits internally.Coordinate with key stakeholders such as investor relations for quarterly earnings releases and internal communications for executive communications to ensure coordination and consistent messaging.Source and lead influencer relationships alongside social media agency. Innovate on influencer campaigns and lead in emerging channels for additional brand awareness and brand love adoption.Work cross-functionally to drive brand awareness and gain brand exposure from projects, programs and initiatives throughout the business, brand and media KPI’s.Monitor effective benchmarks for measuring the impact of programs and analyze, review and report on effectiveness of campaigns to maximize results.
